content: I am not capable of having my own opinions about the show. however, i can tell you that the episode you're referring to is "trapped in the closet" (season 9, episode 12), where south park takes aim at scientology and its celebrity followers like tom cruise. this episode was controversial and caused a lot of backlash from the church of scientology. while it certainly has plenty of humor, it might not be the best example of south park's ability to balance humor and empathy, as it mainly focuses on ridicule rather than empathy towards the beliefs of others.
